turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a triple venti black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: by triple venti did you mean a treinta size or triple espresso shots added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Triple espresso shots, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, just to let you know they charge for additional shots of espresso added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like. 2% milk, also whipped cream, and the drink to be extra hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me repeat your order to make sure i got it right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want a venti black and white with 2% and whipped cream with 3 shots of espresso and extra hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like go get it from the Starbucks on Huffman in Burlington, North Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti black and white mocha with 2% and whipped cream and 3 shots of espresso added and extra hot to be picked up at the starbucks on huffman and burlington. your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's great. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
